DOC.brief_summary: Autologous cell therapy in patients with ALS can stimulate neuroplasticity, modifying the neurodegenerative process and stops the clinical progression of disease.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intrathecal Administration of Hematopoietic Stem Cells in Patients With Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
